definition: simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent

sentences.english: Have you and joan forgotten our dinner date?
sentences.chinese: 你和簡忘記我們的晚捕緙會了嗎？

sentences.english: Jane worked out a beautiful design for a sweater.
sentences.chinese: 簡設計出一種漂亮的運動衫。

sentences.english: Hi. Jane, toss my sweater out!
sentences.chinese: 嘿，簡，把我的毛衣扔出來。

sentences.english: Janet pulled the page from her typewriter and looked nervously at her wrist-watch.
sentences.chinese: 簡尼特從她的打字機裏抽出紙，緊張地看了看手錶。

sentences.english: Mary never does any reading in the evening, nor does Jane.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗晚上從不看書，簡也不看。

sentences.english: Jane always said yes when he asked her out.
sentences.chinese: 每當約翰來約，簡總是說行，次次如此。

sentences.english: She quickly regretted the decision and locked him out of their honeymoon suite.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，簡很快反悔，並把自己鎖在了蜜月套房裏頭。

sentences.english: Jane, how do you do this? Your plates are always spotless.
sentences.chinese: 簡，你是怎麼弄的？你家的碟子總是一塵不染。

sentences.english: It’s Jane, a good friend he met in his sophomore English class.
sentences.chinese: 是簡，在二年級英語課上遇見的一個好朋友。

sentences.english: A: Jane, I just got your invitation.
sentences.chinese: 簡，我剛收到你們的請柬。

sentences.english: She said that Jane's new coat was old-fashioned and not worth the money she had paid for it.
sentences.chinese: 她說簡的新大衣式樣陳舊，不值得她付出的錢。

sentences.english: Jane stood froze from head to toe and watched the car accelerate down the street.
sentences.chinese: 簡一動不動地站在那兒，看着那輛車沿街急馳而去。

sentences.english: During the absence of Jean, Mary functioned as relief teacher.
sentences.chinese: 簡不在的時候，瑪麗起了代課老師的作用。

sentences.english: If it were my choice, I be to dispatch you, Jane.
sentences.chinese: 假如讓我選，我就派你去，簡。

sentences.english: Please wait a moment, Jane is on another line.
sentences.chinese: 請等那一霎那，簡正在接另一條電話線。

definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip
to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate
to neglect/to skip (class or work)/to waste (time)/vast/loose-fitting
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain
to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
to fit/suitable/proper/just (now)/comfortable/well/to go/to follow or pursue
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)
